_header: Now God almighty have mercy on me
_description: A prayer to God for mercy — one stanza rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
Now god almyghty haue mercy on meffor maryes prayers and al þi
                    sayntes…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Wherfor of al my synnes mercy I cryAnd pray the to bryng me
                    to heuen an hy
BodRawB408.Attributed Title: Misereatur mei omnipotens deus et cetera (f. 6)
